ComicInfo.Title: Invasion Part 7: Enter The Dragon / Invasion Part 8: Supernova
ComicInfo.Summary:
Special “Flip” issue in which one side has a Magnus cover and story, then you flip the comic and the other side has a Rai cover and story. With Grandmother repaired and in full battle mode against the invading alien forces, Magnus and Rai have to join the fight against overwhelming odds and hope that Solar can help in “Invasion Part Seven – Enter the Dragon” and “Invasion Part Eight – Supernova”
Like an impossibly huge robotic dragon, the Host Body of Japan rises into space to battle the Spider Alien invasion fleet! Aiding in the cause are Magnus, Rai, and Solar! Nearby, in an alien craft, Rai's wife, Kazuyo, steals a Commando-Class X-O Armor and returns to earth to save her infant son. In space, the aliens penetrate Japan's Skull-Dome, threatening to overpower Rai and Magnus and destroy the Grand-One!
Contains a coupon for Magnus # 0.
Flipbook with Rai # 4 Miniseries (Cover see below).
